scripts.postbuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const cwd=process.cwd();const sourceDist=path.join(cwd,'dist');const ensure=(p)=>fs.mkdirSync(p,{recursive:true});const copy=(from,to)=>{if(!fs.existsSync(from))return;ensure(to);for(const entry of fs.readdirSync(from)){fs.cpSync(path.join(from,entry),path.join(to,entry),{recursive:true});}};const hasWorkspaces=(pkgPath)=>{try{const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgPath,'utf8'));return Array.isArray(pkg.workspaces)&&pkg.workspaces.includes('backend');}catch{return false;}};ensure(sourceDist);const roots=[cwd];const cwdPkg=path.join(cwd,'package.json');if(hasWorkspaces(cwdPkg)){const backendRoot=path.join(cwd,'backend');if(fs.existsSync(backendRoot))roots.push(backendRoot);}const parent=path.resolve(cwd,'..');const parentPkg=path.join(parent,'package.json');if(hasWorkspaces(parentPkg)){roots.push(parent);const parentBackend=path.join(parent,'backend');if(fs.existsSync(parentBackend))roots.push(parentBackend);}for(const root of roots){const target=path.join(root,'dist');if(path.resolve(target)===path.resolve(sourceDist))continue;copy(sourceDist,target);} "
scripts.start: prisma migrate deploy && node dist/seed.js && node dist/index.js
